General.Name: Abaxx Technologies Inc.
General.Description: Abaxx Technologies Inc., a financial software company, develops software tools for commodity traders and finance professionals to communicate, trade, and transact. The company engages in the development of exchange and marketplace infrastructure, including trading and clearing software, financial messaging and data services, digital identity, and access management software; and a regulated commodity futures exchange and clearing house. Abaxx Technologies Inc. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
